name: MLBoundingBoxAnchor
desc: A location within a bounding box that an annotation’s coordinates use as their reference point.

items.name: case center
items.desc: An anchor at the bounding box’s center point.

items.name: case topLeft
items.desc: An anchor at the bounding box’s top-left corner.

items.name: case bottomLeft
items.desc: An anchor at the bounding box’s bottom-left corner.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value of the bounding box anchor.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the bounding box anchor by feeding them into the hasher.

items.name: static func == (MLBoundingBoxAnchor, MLBoundingBoxAnchor) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two anchors are equal.

items.name: static func != (MLBoundingBoxAnchor, MLBoundingBoxAnchor) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether two anchors are unequal.
